name: agent_id
label: ElevenLabs Agent ID
help_text: The ElevenLabs Conversational AI agent ID. Find this in your ElevenLabs dashboard under Agents.

name: avatar_image
label: Luke Avatar Image
help_text: Luke's face image for the floating button and chat widget. Recommended 200x200px. If empty, uses the bundled default.

name: greeting_text
label: Default Greeting
default: Hey {name}, I'm Luke. I can answer any questions you have about Primal Zone and the services we offer, but cannot provide Medical advice. What brings you here today?
help_text: The first message Luke says when chat opens. Use {name} as a placeholder for the visitor's first name (removed automatically if unknown).

name: tooltip_text
label: Button Tooltip
help_text: Tooltip shown on hover over the floating button.

children.name: enable_voice
children.label: Enable Voice Mode
children.help_text: When disabled, Luke operates in text-only mode (no microphone required).

children.name: show_on_mobile
children.label: Show on Mobile
children.help_text: Show the Luke AI button on mobile devices.

children.name: widget_version
children.label: Widget Embed Version
children.help_text: Pin the @elevenlabs/convai-widget-embed CDN version. Change only if upgrading.

children.name: debug_mode
children.label: Debug Mode
children.help_text: Enable console logging for troubleshooting. Also activatable via ?debugLuke=1 URL parameter.
